Practicing & Sharing time

In today, the internet is already changing n impacting the way of life we are living in.

We all need to figure one thing out that the internet is a environment, not tools.

Recently, some of my friends who shared their thoughts about e-marketing are in the begin of creating their own business.

They thought that the decline of brick-and-mortar bookshops is inevitable.

Apparently, they are right but it seems to limit the think of people to get an innovative breakthrough on business in this time.

Nevertheless, if we think it in another perspective, we could find a new way of life with internet and technology.

For instance, a new company called Uber that offer services to people is associated with taxi n internet. This innovation company actually make the internet being their environment of business, not tools. Or I can dail to taxi store with my phone if I want to go someplace.

Anyway, trying to think out of the box n I wanna share a sentence to you guys n my friends that "the future of business is about being more connected to our humanity, not less." — Marie Forleo

#practiceEnglishwriting #practicethinkdifferent #time
